text: Piroska Tamássy is a Hungarian former long track speed skater, who was active in the 1960s. Tamássy represented her nation at the World Allround Speed Skating Championships for Women in 1964, finishing 32nd overall. She also competed at other international competitions. Between 1965 and 1969 she competed five times at the Hungarian Allround Championships and became national champion in 1965. She won the silver medal in 1966 and 1967 and the bronze medal in 1968 and 1969. == Records== === Personal records === ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Date of birth missing (living people) Category:Hungarian female speed skaters Category:Living people
title: Piroska Tamássy
